fMass.label: Physical - Weight
fMass.Description: This is the weight of the vehicle in kilograms (kg) and only affects other entities (no effect on physics).

fInitialDragCoeff.label: Physical - Drag
fInitialDragCoeff.Description: Determines the initial drag coefficient, influencing the vehicle's aerodynamics and air resistance at higher speeds.

fDownforceModifier.label: Physical - Downforce
fDownforceModifier.Description: Specifies the downforce applied to the vehicle, affecting the vehicle's grip and traction at higher speeds.

fPopUpLightRotation.label: Physical - Pop-up light rotation
fPopUpLightRotation.Description: Rotation of the pop-up headlights, if the vehicle supports it, in degrees.

fSteeringLock.label: Steering - Angle
fSteeringLock.Description: This value is the absolute maximum steering angle in degrees. At higher speeds, the game scales this value down to improve handling.

fCamberStiffnesss.label: Steering - Camber stiffness
fCamberStiffnesss.Description: This value modifies the grip of the car when you're sliding. In general, it makes your car slide more on sideways movement.

fBrakeForce.label: Brakes - Force
fBrakeForce.Description: Determines the force applied by the brakes, affecting the vehicle's deceleration rate.

fBrakeBiasFront.label: Brakes - Front bias
fBrakeBiasFront.Description: Sets the bias towards front or rear braking, influencing the distribution of braking force.

fHandBrakeForce.label: Brakes - Handbrake force
fHandBrakeForce.Description: Specifies the force applied by the handbrake, affecting the vehicle's ability to perform handbrake turns.

fDriveBiasFront.label: Transmission - Front bias
fDriveBiasFront.Description: This value controls the distribution of engine power between the axles, separated into front and rear axles. It takes the front axle as reference, and thus 1.0 gives 100% of the engine power to the front axle.

fInitialDriveForce.label: Transmission - Drive force
fInitialDriveForce.Description: Determines the force applied to propel the vehicle, influencing acceleration and overall performance.

fInitialDriveMaxFlatVel.label: Transmission - Max speed
fInitialDriveMaxFlatVel.Description: Sets the maximum speed at which the vehicle can achieve under normal conditions. Setting this value does not guarantee that the vehicle will reach this speed.

nInitialDriveGears.label: Transmission - Gears
nInitialDriveGears.Description: How many forward speeds a transmission contains.

fDriveInertia.label: Transmission - Inertia
fDriveInertia.Description: Affects the inertia of the drivetrain, affecting how quickly the vehicle accelerates.

fClutchChangeRateScaleUpShift.label: Transmission - Upshift rate
fClutchChangeRateScaleUpShift.Description: Multiplies the rate at which the clutch engages during upshifts in the transmission.

fClutchChangeRateScaleDownShift.label: Transmission - Downshift rate
fClutchChangeRateScaleDownShift.Description: Multiplies the rate at which the clutch engages during downshifts in the transmission.

fTractionCurveMax.label: Traction - Maximum grip
fTractionCurveMax.Description: The maximum grip of the vehicles' tires when on the ground.

fTractionCurveMin.label: Traction - Minimum grip
fTractionCurveMin.Description: The minimum grip of the vehicles' tires when skidding and drifting.

fTractionCurveLateral.label: Traction - Lateral curve
fTractionCurveLateral.Description: In degrees, this governs at what point the vehicle starts to become unstable, causing it to slide (or drift).

fTractionLossMult.label: Traction - Loss
fTractionLossMult.Description: How much is traction affected by material grip differences from 1.0. Basically it affects how much grip is changed when driving on asphalt and mud (the higher, the more grip you loose, making car less responsive and prone to sliding).

fLowSpeedTractionLossMult.label: Traction - Loss (low speed)
fLowSpeedTractionLossMult.Description: Multiplier for traction loss at low speeds. It determines how much the traction is reduced when the vehicle is moving slowly.

fTractionSpringDeltaMax.label: Traction - Spring delta
fTractionSpringDeltaMax.Description: This value denotes at what distance above the ground the car will lose traction.

fTractionBiasFront.label: Traction - Front bias
fTractionBiasFront.Description: Sets the bias of traction towards the front or rear of the vehicle, influencing the distribution of traction forces. (0.48 is recommended)

fSuspensionForce.label: Suspension - Force
fSuspensionForce.Description: The force of the suspension springs deals with how much force the suspension will apply to keep the vehicle at the default ride height.

fSuspensionCompDamp.label: Suspension - Compression damping
fSuspensionCompDamp.Description: Sets the damping force applied during suspension compression, controlling how quickly the suspension rebounds after compression.

fSuspensionReboundDamp.label: Suspension - Rebound damping
fSuspensionReboundDamp.Description: Defines the damping force applied during suspension rebound, controlling how quickly the suspension compresses after rebounding.

fSuspensionUpperLimit.label: Suspension - Upper limit
fSuspensionUpperLimit.Description: Only affects visuals. Sets the upper limit of the suspension travel, influencing the maximum distance the suspension can compress.

fSuspensionLowerLimit.label: Suspension - Lower limit
fSuspensionLowerLimit.Description: Only affects visuals. Specifies the lower limit of the suspension travel, affecting the maximum distance the suspension can extend.

fSuspensionRaise.label: Suspension - Raise
fSuspensionRaise.Description: Determines the rate at which the suspension raises the vehicle, affecting the speed at which the vehicle returns to its normal ride height after compression.

fSuspensionBiasFront.label: Suspension - Front bias
fSuspensionBiasFront.Description: Sets the bias of the suspension towards the front or rear of the vehicle, influencing the distribution of suspension forces.

fAntiRollBarForce.label: Rollbar - Force
fAntiRollBarForce.Description: Defines the force applied by the anti-roll bars, affecting the vehicle's resistance to body roll during cornering.

fAntiRollBarBiasFront.label: Rollbar - Front bias
fAntiRollBarBiasFront.Description: Specifies the bias of the anti-roll bars towards the front or rear, influencing the distribution of anti-roll forces.

fRollCentreHeightFront.label: Rollbar - Front center height
fRollCentreHeightFront.Description: Relative to the bottom of the vehicle, defines where the pivot point is. This is used for leaning.

fRollCentreHeightRear.label: Rollbar - Rear center height
fRollCentreHeightRear.Description: Relative to the bottom of the vehicle, defines where the pivot point is. This is used for leaning.

vecCentreOfMassOffset.label: Advanced - Centre of Mass
vecCentreOfMassOffset.Description: This value shifts the center of gravity in meters from side to side (when in vehicle looking forward).

vecInertiaMultiplier.label: Advanced - Inertia Multiplier
vecInertiaMultiplier.Description: Specifies the inertia multiplier for the vehicle, affecting the vehicle's resistance to rotation.

fRocketBoostCapacity.label: Advanced - Boost Capacity
fRocketBoostCapacity.Description: The capacity of the rocket boost, affecting the duration of the boost.

fBoostMaxSpeed.label: Advanced - Boost Max Speed
fBoostMaxSpeed.Description: The maximum speed of the rocket boost, affecting the top speed of the boost.
